alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Northeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:09PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Johnson County through 445 PM MDT... At 406 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buffalo, moving slowly east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain of one-quarter to one-half inch and pea sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and ponding of water on the roadways. Locations impacted include... Buffalo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between mile markers 292 and 299. Interstate 90 between mile markers 54 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Seek shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Northeast Johnson County
